newsArray.title: Vítor Pereira sacked by Wolves after bleak 10-game winless run
creator: Guardian sport
newsArray.description: Wolves bottom with two points from 10 gamesSide yet to win a Premier League game this seasonWolves have sacked Vítor Pereira in the wake of their 3-0 defeat by Fulham, which left them bottom with two points from 10 games and eight points adrift of the last safe spot. The move comes despite his signing a three-year contract in September.The Portuguese was appointed last December in succession to Gary O’Neil, with Wolves 19th, with nine points from 16 matches. He quickly reinvigorated the team and they were safe by late April, before finishing 16th, earning 33 points from their last 22 games.More to follow Continue reading...

newsArray.title: Sports News | Jamshedpur End Their AIFF Super Cup 2025-26 Campaign on a High
creator: ANI
newsArray.description: Get latest articles and stories on Sports at LatestLY. Jamshedpur FC finally found their spark in the AIFF Super Cup 2025-26, claiming a 2-0 victory against Inter Kashi in their final Group B match at the GMC Stadium, in Bambolim on Saturday, as per the official website of All India Football Federation (AIFF).
